Text:

Will be a pleasure to rewatch this masterpiece. Thanks!

@bharatrn 
The movies you want are already uploaded here on pirate. What to do? To encode them like this one (smaller size and good quality) or do you want a plain blu ray encode (no matter how they are) ?
If it's not too much trouble to you, I would love a smaller sized upload. I don't mind uploads with 4k-6k bitrates. But now all I find on TPB(for niche movies) have 10k bitrates with Russian audios:(
Please encode them only if you want to and thanks again for this.
I'm encoding them. Will take several hours. You're welcomed.
Many thanks to the uploader. This is a great film, and I appreciate being able to see it thanks to you!
